title: Large dagga haul after tip-off
text:
Harare police have confiscated a large quantity of dagga following a tip-off.

Police arrested a 40-year-old man at 16:00 on Wednesday 20 June after they received information about drug sales.

Police followed up on the information and went to the Endlovini informal settlement address where it was reported that dagga was being sold.

Police searched the house and confiscated four parcels of dagga and 86 dagga packets.

The suspect has made a court appearance in Khayelitsha Magistrates’ Court on related charges.
description: Harare police have confiscated a large quantity of dagga following a tip-off.
